placeDesc: Traveling between shows, Hank Williams was found dead in the back seat of his baby blue Cadillac when his driver pulled over for gas and food. A monument to mark this sad occasion was erected in front of the town library, close to the site of the gas station.
placeShortDesc: A humble plaque marks the site where the country music legend was found dead in his Cadillac.
placeRelatedPlaces: Aretha Franklin Subway Tributes,Massacre of Glencoe Monument,Burke and Wills Monument,Michael Jackson Denkmal (Michael Jackson Memorial)
